snippet: Two people fatally shot two police officers at a restaurant before killing a third victim at a second site and then shooting themselves, the police said.

byline.original: By EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS and ASHLEY SOUTHALL

lead_paragraph: Two people fatally shot two police officers at a restaurant before killing a third victim at a second site and then shooting themselves, the police said.

headline.main: Five Killed in Las Vegas Shootings
headline.print_headline: Five Killed in Las Vegas Shootings
